events.name: Future EV adoption and demand for battery raw materials
events.wd_label: Future EV adoption and demand for battery raw materials
events.wd_description: Depends on overcoming multiple barriers, including charging infrastructure, sufficient electricity generation, and the availability of battery raw materials at acceptable costs.
events.description: Depends on overcoming multiple barriers, including charging infrastructure, sufficient electricity generation, and the availability of battery raw materials at acceptable costs.

events.name: Charging Infrastructure
events.wd_description: Needs to be established for widespread EV adoption.
events.description: Needs to be established for widespread EV adoption.

events.name: Sufficient Electricity Generation
events.wd_description: Required to support increased demand for electricity from EV charging.
events.description: Required to support increased demand for electricity from EV charging.

events.name: Availability of Battery Raw Materials
events.wd_description: Needed at acceptable costs to support EV battery production.
events.description: Needed at acceptable costs to support EV battery production.

events.name: EV deployment and associated increased demand for raw materials
events.wd_label: EV deployment and associated increased demand for raw materials
events.wd_description: Will have a greater impact on prices for cobalt than nickel and, in turn, for nickel than copper.
events.description: Will have a greater impact on prices for cobalt than nickel and, in turn, for nickel than copper.

events.name: EV Deployment
events.wd_description: Will lead to increased demand for raw materials.
events.description: Will lead to increased demand for raw materials.

events.name: Increased Demand for Raw Materials
events.wd_description: Will drive up prices for cobalt, nickel, and copper.
events.description: Will drive up prices for cobalt, nickel, and copper.

events.name: Recycling of EV batteries
events.wd_description: Will be important for sustainable production and reducing waste.
events.description: Will be important for sustainable production and reducing waste.

events.name: Recycling Technology
events.wd_description: Needs to be developed and implemented.
events.description: Needs to be developed and implemented.

events.name: Public Acceptance
events.wd_description: Needed for widespread adoption of EV battery recycling.
events.description: Needed for widespread adoption of EV battery recycling.

events.name: cobalt supply
events.wd_description: Cobalt is a key material in EV batteries, and its supply is influenced by its co-production with other metals.
events.description: Cobalt is a key material in EV batteries, and its supply is influenced by its co-production with other metals.
